name: Fight!
text: Target another friendly model within 12". Target model may immediately perform a melee attack action for free

name: Move!
text: Target another friendly model within 12". Target model may immediately perform a Walk action for free

name: Direct Attack
text: Target an enemy model within 12"and LOS. Roll 1D6. On a 3+ that model suffers 1 mortal wound, on a 6 that model suffers 2 mortal wounds

name: Instill Fear
text: Target an enemy model within 12"and LOS. That model must make a Nerve test; if it fails it must immediately perform a Run action directly away from this model, then mark it as activated (if not activated already)

name: Terrorize
text: Target an enemy model within 12"and LOS. That model must make a Nerve test; if it fails it gets the following condition for one round: Paralyzed: This model cannot perform any actions.

name: Reduce Command
text: Target an enemy model that has a CP stat greater than 0, within 24" and LOS. Roll 1D6, on a 1-3 the opposing player loses 1 command point, on a 4+ the opposing player loses 2 command points.

name: Stun
text: Target an enemy model within 12" and LOS. That model gets the following condition: Stunned: This model only gets 1 short action during its turn, cannot be given an extra action, cannot be re-activated and cannot retaliate; remove this condition at the end of its activation

name: Sleep
text: Target an enemy model within 12" and LOS. That model gets the following condition for one round: Sleep: This model is knocked down and cannot perform any actions; remove this condition if the model takes any damage.

name: Target Lock
text: Target an enemy model within 24" and LOS. That model gets the following condition for one round: Targeted: Any ranged attacks targeting this model get the Aim modifier

name: Feint
text: Target an enemy model engaged with this model. That model gets the following condition for one round: Off-Balance: Any melee attacks targeting this model get the Focus modifier

name: Cure
text: Target a model within 1" and LOS. Remove 1 condition from that model

name: Heal
text: Target a model within 1" and LOS. Roll 1D6. On a 1+ that model heals 1 wound, on a 4+ that model heals 2 wounds

name: Greater Heal
text: Target a model within 1" and LOS. Target model heals 3 wounds
